Text:
@ Debpk77

Tui Kano Eta 2 CD Rip E Karechilis Ta Ami Jani ! Anyoder Mithya Bale Bojate Parbi, Amake Noy ! Tui Ja Karchis Seta Thik Na ! Nicher Screen Ta Dekh :---


http://www.shotpix.com/images/23112642666758243464.jpg


Bujtei Parchis Eta Dosar Er Unedited Part 2 ! Timings Gulo Dekh ! 2005 E Edit Kara ! Dosar Movie Ta Ami Original Release Karbar 4 Months Age Pai ! Kintu Net E Konodin Bar Karini ! Karon Seta Unethical Ja Tui Korchis !

Tollywood / Bollywood Film Industry Er Ekta Alikhito Rule Ache ! Sekhane Sabai Sab Kichu Dekhe & Abar Almira Er Madhye Lukiye Fele ! Kintu Tui Amake Beat Karbar Janyo Rule Break Korchis ! Toke 100 Ta Info Er Madhye 4 Te Ullekh
Karlam ! Pare Dekh !

1) Rituporno Ghosh Er Ek Kaler Homo Partner Chilo Sumanto Khosh ! ( Swastika Mukherjee Er Kaka ! ) ! R.Ghosh & Sumanto Er Ekta Open Leap Kiss Ache Public Party Te ! Seta Er Clip Aneker Kache Ache ! Tor Hate Parle Tui Ki Seta
Bar Kare Dibi ?

2) Antarmahal 2 Reel Unedited Version Bahu Loker Kache Ache ! Tor Seta Bar Karbar Courage Ache ?

3) Antarmahal Shoot Karbar Samay Raima Sen Er Buker Kapor Puro Khule Giye Dudh Duto Beriye Ase ! Raimar Hasi + Dialouge O Ache Guchcho Guchcho Loker Kache ! Tor Bar Karbar Himmat Ache ?

4) Chandan Sen ( Jar Cancer Hayeche ) Er Serial Er Nayikar ( Naam Bala Jabe Na ! ) Sathe Hotel Er Ghare Anek Sundor Video Ache ! Amar Mane Hay Tor Hate Parle Segulo Tui Bar Kare Dibi ! 

Oporer Je 4 Te Example Dilam Tar Jadi Ektao Mithya Hay Ta Hale Ami British Council Er Samne Kaan Dhare Langto Haye Nachbo ! Tui Jar Kach Theke Supply Pachis Take Jigyasa Kare Dekhte Paris ! Er Praytek Ta Amar Kache ( Eta Khub Ekta Baro Bapar Na, Tollywood Er Prachur Loker Kache Egulo Ache, Tara Kintu Keu Tor Mato Movie Market Berubar Age  Release Kare Dey Na False Credit Nebar Janyo ! ), Kintu Ektao Kono Din Bar Korbo Na ! This Is Not Ethical ! I'm Not A Traitor Like You !

Amar 500 Mb mkv Rip Ta Dekhis ! Tor Theke Pic Quality Baje Hay Ni ! Toke Ar Kichu Balbar Nei ! Bapar Ta Bhalo Kare Vebe Dekhis !

@ rdb119

debpk77 is a businessman but I'm a lecturer ! student parano ta amar kaj ! debpk77 ami TPB te release karbar age kata Bengali Movie up kareche TPB te ? Or baaler team member de sathe join karbar kono iche amar nei..

You know I am surprised at the tone and comments of Robin5555. More so since I am not the least acquainted with him. Thank Goodness!

First, let me clarify that I am not a businessman. I, like many others, work at a job and in my spare time rip a bit and share it with others.

Second, unlike what Robin5555 seems to believe, my source is fully legal. Chaplin may not be out in India, but it is certainly legally available overseas. If you want proof go to amazon.

Third, I have no idea what wrong I have committed so I cant defend myself on that score. The grouse seems to be that I have uploaded this movie before Robin5555 could! I don't think it is a crime to do so.

Fourth, I have no claim to be the greatest ripper in the world. If Robin5555 can give better images and sound in a 500MB rip, more power to him! 

So far as his four examples are concerned, I really don't see their relevance. I do not compete for being the first ever ripper. I rip for my pleasure and never ever for money. Nor have I ever ripped uncensored movies...

Finally, what I rip is my choice, not that of Robin5555.

Just in passing, as a teacher I would have expected more refined language from Robin5555
I just wanted to add that I do not release in piratebay or other public trackers and so the field is open to the likes of Robin5555 as well...

2. If ur members do not try to cross my path i never want to give you / ur members a single trouble except tamaltoru & technosusovon !

Be Happy & Have A Prosperous Life !
